item.title: Web API Application Security
item.description: Notes taken from the 2-day workshop for Web API Applications Security: Attack and Defense from NDC Copenhagen 2020 held online on April 2020; this focuses primarily on practical application security on Web Applications whereat different attack vectors and mitigation techniques are reviewed.
